scripts.release: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const rel=process.env.RELEASE_ID||execSync('git rev-parse --short HEAD').toString().trim();const dest=path.join('public','assets','v',rel);fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync('public/assets/dev/main.css',path.join(dest,'main.css'));fs.copyFileSync('public/assets/dev/main.js',path.join(dest,'main.js'));const sw='public/sw.js';let s=fs.readFileSync(sw,'utf8');s=s.replace(/const VERSION = \"[^\"]+\";/,'const VERSION = \"'+rel+'\";');fs.writeFileSync(sw,s);console.log('RELEASE_ID',rel);"
